record.id: field.name="$param.piiHide" and file.name="SMISConfiguration" and term=NULL and format.name="wizard-smis.msteams.param" and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: $param.piiHide
record.file.name: SMISConfiguration
record.format.name: wizard-smis.msteams.param

brief.brief: Select whether to hide the participants’ names in the conversation history to protect their personal identification information (PII) or not.

In Teams, all conversation participants have their distinctive names. However, if you select this checkbox, the Conversation tab in Service Manager displays the value you specified in General Display Name instead of all participants’ names.
